body: ALGORITHMS FOR INTERPOLATION, APPROXIMATION, INTEGRATION, NONLINEAR EQUATIONS, LINEAR SYSTEMS, FAST FOURIER TRANSFORM, AND DIFFERENTIAL EQUATIONS EMPHASIZING COMPUTATIONAL PROPERTIES AND IMPLEMENTATION. STUDENTS MAY TAKE ONLY ONE COURSE FOR CREDIT FROM MATH 451 AND 455.(Credits: 3)(Prerequisites: Prerequisite: 3 credits of programming; MATH 230 or MATH 231)(Additional Attributes: Cross-listed with: MATH 451)

STUDENTS MAY TAKE ONLY ONE COURSE FOR CREDIT FROM MATH 451 AND 455.(Credits: 3)(Prerequisites: Prerequisite: 3 credits of programming; MATH 230 or MATH 231)(Additional Attributes: Cross-listed with: MATH 451)
title: CMPSC 451: Numerical Computations
